me athara ada (apriyel 10) kabinat mandala raswime di "shri lanka nidahas pakshaye amathiwarun aanduwa ha rata asthawara karamin katayuthu kirima" gana eeta sahabhagi wu amathyawarun kipa denek dadiwa adahas dakwa athi athara, mema gataluwa sinhala-hindu aluth awuruddata pera nirakaranaya karana bawa janadhipathi maithripala sirisena pawasa atha.

me anuwa mathlolinge ha dumata abbahiwuwange thorathuru ekras kara thabimata saukhya amathyanshaya piyawara gena thibe.me wadasatahana labana masa mula sita sama gamakama ha sama nagarayakama kriyathmaka we.dum bimata ha arakku bimata abbahi wuwange thorathuru ekras kirima sandaha rata pura sama gamakama ha nagarayakama punaruththapana eekaka pihituwimata piyawara gena thibe.dum bimata ha arakku bimata abbahi wu gramiya janathawa in muda ganime aramunen me wadapiliwela kriyathmaka karana bawa saukhya amathyanshaya kiyayi.pradeshiya lekam, grama niladhari, mahajana saukhya parikshaka, pawul saukhya niladhari, samruddhi niladharinge sahaya labaganimin pradeshaye mathdrawyayata abbahi wu pudgalayange thorathuru ekras kirima sidu karana bawa saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha wadiduratath kiyayi.sigarat, bidi, suruttu, arakku bona pudgalayan saha bulathwita kana pudgalayan lesa wargikaranaya kara punaruththapana eekaka mangin owun danumwath kere.
eya libiyawa pura nagarawalata ha madhyasthana wetha kaෲs misayil ha bomba helimata niyoga di athi athara danatamath boho denek marumuwata pathkota siyagananakata thuwala sidukota atha.

nutan,shashikala,wani sinama tharu da film feyar sangarawe karthru karanjiya da sarasawiya sammana ulelata sahabhagi wu ayuru mata thawamath mathakaya.me nalu niliyan daka bala ganmata athi wishala janakayak rok wuha.ulele sanwidhanaya kerune sammana pilibanda purna rahasgatha bhawaya rakimini.me ulelata apa dayaka wuwa da sammana pilibanda rahasa ehi sammana piri namena thuruma apata da rahasak wiya.atham sinama shilpinge wayama kese home rahas kalin dana ganimaya.me sandaha owun wiwidha upakrama yodathi.
